text.autoconfig.healthvignette.title: HealthVignette Settings
text.autoconfig.healthvignette.option.en: Enable or disable the health vignette effect entirely.
text.autoconfig.healthvignette.option.in: Modify the health percentage at which the health vignette effect begins to appear.
text.autoconfig.healthvignette.option.se: Modify the health percentage at which the health vignette effect should appear at maximum intensity.
text.autoconfig.healthvignette.option.vi: Modify the color of the health vignette effect. Uses the hex color code format.
Modify the intensity of the health vignette effect.
